name: CheckLastDiagnosis
description: ask for the last diagnosis of a patient

sampleUtterances.utterance: What was the his last {count} diagnosis?
Tell me the diagnosis of his last {count} ICU visits.
This name visited the ICU {count} before, what were the diagnoses?
This {name} visited the ICU before, what was the diagnosis?
Why was he in ICU the last {count} times?
The reason of his last {count} ICU visits?
The cause of his last {count} ICU visits?
What was the patient's previous diagnosis?

plainTextMessage.value: Sorry, I cannot find this patient's record
